snippet: United Nations human rights investigators have gathered testimony from casualties of Syria’s civil war and medical workers indicating that rebel forces have used the nerve agent.
abstract: United Nations human rights investigators gather testimony from casualties of Syria’s civil war and medical workers indicating that country's rebel forces have used the nerve agent sarin.
